IIChE - IITR


We, the Indian Institute of Chemical Engineers (IIChE), Student Chapter, IIT Roorkee is a student body mainly aimed at increasing the knowledge base and for the overall development of the students of Chemical Engineering by various activities, which enables them to become better professionals. Our group is the first of its kind in our department and aims at making the students informed about the scope of Chemical Engineering and making it possible for them to choose the best path for them. We regularly organize competitions, lectures, and workshops in this effect.
